GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Sanity check block descriptor length in resp_mode_select()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.88 by commit a9078e791426c2cbbdf28a320c3670f6e0a611e6. For more details please see the references link.
